name: Autocropping
title: Autocropping
description: Automatically remove noise and other useless sections from images.
author: Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inputDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

inputs.name: filePattern
inputs.description: File pattern to use for grouping images.

inputs.name: cropX
inputs.description: Whether to crop along the x-axis

inputs.name: cropY
inputs.description: Whether to crop along the y-axis

inputs.name: cropZ
inputs.description: Whether to crop along the z-axis

inputs.name: smoothing
inputs.description: Whether to use gaussian smoothing on images to add more tolerance to noise.

ui.title: Input collection
ui.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin.

ui.title: File Pattern
ui.description: File pattern to use for grouping images.

ui.title: Grouping Variables
ui.description: Variables to use for grouping images. Each group is cropped to the same bounding-box.

ui.title: Crop X
ui.description: Whether to crop along the x-axis

ui.title: Crop Y
ui.description: Whether to crop along the y-axis

ui.title: Crop Z
ui.description: Whether to crop along the z-axis

ui.title: Smoothing
ui.description: Whether to use gaussian smoothing on images to add more tolerance to noise.
